In this last case, two jobs are failing to get past a barrier within ten
seconds. The wait on the barrier is in 100 ms increments. Running this test on
my dual 3Ghz box, it takes from 200ms to 2.7 seconds to get past the barrier. It
is likely that on a slow test machine it was jst exceeding the ten second limit.
I have increased the limit to thirty seconds.

traces.message: Timeout waiting for status to change from  BLOCKED to WAIT_FOR_RUN
Timeout waiting for job to end
